issue.title: Cant decrease gazebo main window height

content.raw: Apparently the Building Editor has a minimum size of approximately 800 pixels , and this minimum size is inherited by the MainWindow of Gazebo even if the Building Editor is hidden. This regression was introduced in this PR :  #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/1242/building-editor-new-buttons-and-layout-for/diff .
